author: Vertyco
description: Xbox tools for getting player data (WIP more features to come)
end_user_data_statement:
This cog uses the xbl.io API and does not persistently store data about users.
**Note:**
This cog will NOT pull xbox profile's 'real name' or 'location data' just gamerscore, pfp, xuid and bio ect..
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Use `[p]help XTools` for more info.
